channel.title: Posts on Ian McDonald's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ian McDonald's blog

item.title: First post
item.description: Over the years I’ve had a number of blogs and published contents in different places - the most recent being at http://blog.next-genit.co.uk/. So why create a new blog now? Well hopefully this post will explain a bit more! The main reason was because I started a new role (CTO in residence at Microsoft for Startups), along with wanting to talk more about my autism, and I thought I’d better do a blog a bit more technical than just using something like Blogger or pre-packaged Wordpress.
